column1: For the climate angle, substitute #covid19 —> 'climate & transition risk' (incl effect on frequency of pandemics); & #pandemic —> 'risk multiplier.' Note coronaviruses are all the rage now but hardly the only possible pathogen. cf this old Sandman post http://www.cidrap.umn.edu/news-perspective/2007/02/severe-pandemic-not-overdue-its-not-when-if
